import React, { useState} from 'react' import c from './Basket.module.scss' import cl from 'classnames' export const CartItem = ({product}) => { const [amout,setAmount]=useState(1); return (<>
{product.photo &&}
{product.name}
1
{product.sale} ₴ {product.sale } ₴
{product.photo &&} {product.name} {amout} {product.sale} ₴ {product.sale * amout} ₴ ) }
